name: Flüssiggas-Lagerbehälter 43 m3, DN 50-DN 25,
description:
Execution: not overdrivable, mounded,
with epoxy resin coating
tank dimensions:
- diameter: 2230 mm
- length: approx. 11530 mm
- working temperature: -20 / +50 °C
- max. allowable pressure: 20 bar
connections:
- 1 pcs man hole DN500
- 1 pcs. filling device: flange DN 50 PN 40
according to DIN EN 1092-1 (DIN 2635) with
compact-ballvalve DN 50 (FAS 92156)
- 1 pcs. liquid discharge line beneath the tank:
flange DN 50 PN 40 according to DIN EN 1092-1
(DIN 2635) with compact-ballvalve DN 50 (FAS 92156)
- 1 pcs. drain connection: 1-1/4" female NPT
with Check-Lok
- 1 pcs. return line: flange DN 25 PN 40 according
to DIN EN 1092-1 (DIN 2635) with compact-ballvalve
DN 25 (FAS 92153)
- 1 pcs. bypass line: flange DN 25 PN 40
according to DIN EN 1092-1 (DIN 2635) with
compact-ballvalve DN 25 (FAS 92153)
- 1 pcs. connection 2" female NPT (option) with plug
- including 2 safety relief valves type RegO RS3135 / CD 35
setting pressure 17,5 bar
- 1 pcs. mounting flange with liquid level gauge
- 1 pcs. connection for pressure switch: G 1/2"
with plug
- 1 pcs. connection for pressure gauge: G 1/2"
with pressure gauge
- 1 pcs. connection 1" NPT (3/4") / DN 25, PN 40 for
liquid level sensor as overfill protection
remarks:
- with. 4 pcs. 4 transport lug
- with holder for retrofitting a dome shaft
- with 3-year warranty for coating
- storage tank feet two part devided
- some equipment and components are to be installed on site
for transport technical reasons
approval:
- CE-marking to PED 2014/68/EU
- with certificate of conformity
documentation:
- 2 copies of tank documentation in english
